definition: Classic of Mountain and Sea, probably compiled c. 500 BC-200 BC, contains wide range of geography, mythology, witchcraft, popular customs etc
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing

sentences.english: Liu Xin revised The Classic of Mountains and Rivers, which contributed to the wide spreading in Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 刘歆的校订对于扩大《山海经》在两汉传播亦有贡献。

sentences.english: Many ancient fables and tales are recorded in Shanhai Jing.
sentences.chinese: 山海经》中记载了很多远古的神话传说。

sentences.english: The record about Pictures of Classic of Mountains and Seas is after Dongjing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 关于《山海经》图的记录均是东晋以后的记载。

sentences.english: It also studies the spread and variation of these illustrations in China and the neighboring country Japan.
sentences.chinese: 并探讨山海经图在国内与近邻日本国的流传与变异。

sentences.english: In the ancient geography book Shanhai Jing (The Book of Mountains and Seas), there is an account of "Long-Leg Kingdom".
sentences.chinese: 古文献《山海经》中有关于“长股国”的记述。

sentences.english: We have heard his gossips many times.
sentences.chinese: 山海经我们已经听过很多遍了。

sentences.english: Classic of Mountains and Rivers is an ancient writing coming down for more than two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 《山海经》是一部流传了两千余年的上古时期的典籍。

sentences.english: There has been much dispute over The mountain big lake.
sentences.chinese: 《山海经》自古以来就是一部争议非常大的古籍。

sentences.english: This dissertation chooses Hai Ching in Shan Hai Ching as the research targets.
sentences.chinese: 本文选取《山海经》中《海经》部分进行专题研究。

sentences.english: The original picture of 'Mountains-Seas Book' has never been seen.
sentences.chinese: 山海经古图至今未被发现。

sentences.english: Back in BC, "Book of Mountains and Seas" in the tea oil as a cooking oil will be recorded.
sentences.chinese: 早在公元前《山海经》中便有茶油作为食用油的记载。

definition: mythological story/myth
In Search of the Supernatural, compilation of legends about spirits, ghosts and other supernatural phenomena, written and compiled by 干寶|干宝[Gan1 Bao3] in Jin dynasty
miscellany of writing from the Western Han (aka Former Han)

Investiture of the Gods, major Ming dynasty vernacular novel of mythology and fantasy, very loosely based on King Wu of Zhou's 周武王[Zhou1 Wu3 wang2] overthrow of the Shang, subsequent material for opera, film, TV series, computer games etc
Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio, Qing dynasty book of tales by 蒲松齡|蒲松龄[Pu2 Song1 ling2]
spirits and devils (usually harmful)/demon
Imperial Readings of the Taiping Era, general Song dynasty encyclopedia compiled during 977-983 under Li Fang 李昉[Li3 Fang3], 1000 scrolls
Extensive records of the Taiping era (978), fictional history edited by Li Fang 李昉
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
Jinghua Yuan or Flowers in the Mirror, Qing novel of fantasy and erudition (early 19th century) by Li Ruzhen 李汝珍[Li3 Ru3 zhen1]
ancient history
the distant past/ancient times/antiquity/early historical times
the Yellow Emperor, mythological emperor of China, reigned c. 2697-2597 BC
Gan Bao (?-336), Chinese historian and writer, author of In Search of the Supernatural 搜神記|搜神记[Sou1 shen2 Ji4]
supernatural novel/novel of ghosts and goblins
nine-tailed fox (mythological creature)
